df-xp
blocks.content: Define the Cartesian product of two classes. This is also sometimes called the "cross product" but that term also has other meanings; we intentionally choose a less ambiguous term. Definition 9.11 of [Quine] p. 64. For example, ` ( { 1 , 5 } X. { 2 , 7 } ) = ` ` ( { <. 1 , 2 >. , <. 1 , 7 >. } u. { <. 5 , 2 >. , <. 5 , 7 >. } ) ` ( ~ ex-xp ). Another example is that the set of rational numbers are defined in ~ df-q using the Cartesian product ` ( ZZ X. NN ) ` ; the left- and right-hand sides of the Cartesian product represent the top (integer) and bottom (natural) numbers of a fraction. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-xp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cxp(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
}

blocks.name: df-rel
blocks.content: Define the relation predicate. Definition 6.4(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23. For alternate definitions, see ~ dfrel2 and ~ dfrel3 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-cnv
blocks.content: Define the converse of a class. Definition 9.12 of [Quine] p. 64. The converse of a binary relation swaps its arguments, i.e., if ` A e. _V ` and ` B e. _V ` then ` ( A ``' R B <-> B R A ) ` , as proven in ~ brcnv (see ~ df-br and ~ df-rel for more on relations). For example, ` ``' { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } = { <. 6 , 2 >. , <. 9 , 3 >. } ` ( ~ ex-cnv ). We use Quine's breve accent (smile) notation. Like Quine, we use it as a prefix, which eliminates the need for parentheses. Many authors use the postfix superscript "minus one". The term "converse" is Quine's terminology; some authors call it "inverse", especially when the argument is a function. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)

blocks.name: df-co
blocks.content: Define the composition of two classes. Definition 6.6(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. For example, ` ( ( exp o. cos ) `` 0 ) = _e ` ( ~ ex-co ) because ` ( cos `` 0 ) = 1 ` (see ~ cos0 ) and ` ( exp `` 1 ) = _e ` (see ~ df-e ). Note that Definition 7 of [Suppes] p. 63 reverses ` A ` and ` B ` , uses ` /. ` instead of ` o. ` , and calls the operation "relative product." (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-co(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-co(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àò c1)= { < s0, s1 > | ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c1]s2 ‚àß s2[c0]s1))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
}

blocks.name: df-dm
blocks.content: Define the domain of a class. Definition 3 of [Suppes] p. 59. For example, ` F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } -> dom F = { 2 , 3 } ` ( ~ ex-dm ). Another example is the domain of the complex arctangent, ` ( A e. dom arctan <-> ( A e. CC /\ A =/= -u _i /\ A =/= _i ) ) ` (for proof see ~ atandm ). Contrast with range (defined in ~ df-rn ). For alternate definitions see ~ dfdm2 , ~ dfdm3 , and ~ dfdm4 . The notation " ` dom ` " is used by Enderton; other authors sometimes use script D. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-rn
blocks.content: Define the range of a class. For example, ` F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } -> ran F = { 6 , 9 } ` ( ~ ex-rn ). Contrast with domain (defined in ~ df-dm ). For alternate definitions, see ~ dfrn2 , ~ dfrn3 , and ~ dfrn4 . The notation " ` ran ` " is used by Enderton; other authors sometimes use script R or script W. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-res
blocks.content: Define the restriction of a class. Definition 6.6(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. For example, the expression ` ( exp |`` RR ) ` (used in ~ reeff1 ) means "the exponential function e to the x, but the exponent x must be in the reals" ( ~ df-ef defines the exponential function, which normally allows the exponent to be a complex number). Another example is that ` ( F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } ` ` /\ B = { 1 , 2 } ) -> ( F |`` B ) = { <. 2 , 6 >. } ` ( ~ ex-res ). (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-ima
blocks.content: Define the image of a class (as restricted by another class). Definition 6.6(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. For example, ` ( F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } /\ B = { 1 , 2 } ) ` ` -> ( F " B ) = { 6 } ` ( ~ ex-ima ). Contrast with restriction ( ~ df-res ) and range ( ~ df-rn ). For an alternate definition, see ~ dfima2 . (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: xpeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(c0, c1))
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c0 √ó c2)=(c1 √ó c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4g((c0 √ó c2), (c1 √ó c2), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)}, c0 = c1)
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, c0 = c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2))
  anbi1d(c0 = c1, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  eleq2(c0, c1, hs0)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: xpss12
blocks.content: Subset theorem for Cartesian product. Generalization of Theorem 101 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpss12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wss(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3)))
} = {
  3sstr4g(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  im2anan9(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  ssel(c2, c3, cv(hs1))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpss12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)‚Üí(c0 √ó c2)‚äÜ(c1 √ó c3))
} = {
  3sstr4g((c0 √ó c2), (c1 √ó c3), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)}, (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs1, (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3))
  im2anan9(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c3)
  ssel(c0, c1, hs0)
  ssel(c2, c3, hs1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

} = {
  3eqtr4g(cxp(c2, c0), cxp(c2, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), wceq(c0, c1))

  anbi2d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c0)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c1)

  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))

blocks.name: elxpi
blocks.content: Membership in a Cartesian product. Uses fewer axioms than ~ elxp . (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  elabg(hs0, c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  eqtri(cxp(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elxpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, (c1 √ó c2), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))))}, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))
  ibi(c0 ‚àà { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))))}, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))
  elabg(hs0, c0, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))))}, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, hs0 = c0, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)), (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), c0 = < s0, s1 >)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, < s0, s1 >)
  eqtri((c1 √ó c2), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))))}, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)})
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))

blocks.name: elxp
blocks.content: Membership in a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  eleq2i(c0, cxp(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  elopab(s0, s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà(c1 √ó c2), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))), c0 ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)})
  eleq2i(c0, (c1 √ó c2), { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)})
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  elopab(s0, s1, c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))

thm elxp2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  ancom(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  elxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  r2ex(s0, s1, c1, c2, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
}

blocks.name: opelxp
blocks.content: Ordered pair membership in a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm opelxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wrex(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elxp2(hs0, hs1, cop(c0, c1), c2, c3)
  impbii(wrex(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)))
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)))
  biimprcd(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)))
  sylbi(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wb(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, cv(hs1))))
  opth2(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  bi2anan9(wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  eleq1(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eleq1(c1, cv(hs1), c3)
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c0, c1)))
  eqid(cop(c0, c1))
  rspc2ev(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c1, c3, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq2d(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  eqeq2d(cop(c0, c1), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)

thm opelxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (< c0, c1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3))
} = {
  bitri(< c0, c1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3), (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c3, < c0, c1 > = < hs0, hs1 >)))
  elxp2(hs0, hs1, < c0, c1 >, c2, c3)
  impbii(‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c3, < c0, c1 > = < hs0, hs1 >)), (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3))
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, < c0, c1 > = < hs0, hs1 >, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3))
  biimprcd((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3), < c0, c1 > = < hs0, hs1 >, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3))
  sylbi(< c0, c1 > = < hs0, hs1 >, ((c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3)‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)), (c0 = hs0 ‚àß c1 = hs1))
  opth2(c0, c1, hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  bi2anan9(c0 = hs0, c1 = hs1, c0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c3, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c3)
  eleq1(c0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1(c1, hs1, c3)

blocks.name: brxp
blocks.content: Binary relation on a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2004.)

blocks.name: brrelex12
blocks.content: A true binary relation on a relation implies the arguments are sets. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: brrelex1
blocks.content: A true binary relation on a relation implies the first argument is a set. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: brrelex2
blocks.content: A true binary relation on a relation implies the second argument is a set. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: brrelex12i
blocks.content: Two classes that are related by a binary relation are sets. (An artifact of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: brrelex1i
blocks.content: The first argument of a binary relation exists. (An artifact of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-1998.)

blocks.name: brrelex2i
blocks.content: The second argument of a binary relation exists. (An artifact of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: nprrel12
blocks.content: Proper classes are not related via any relation. (Contributed by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: nprrel
blocks.content: No proper class is related to anything via any relation. (Contributed by Roy F. Longton, 30-Jul-2005.)

blocks.name: 0nelrel0
blocks.content: A binary relation does not contain the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2021.) (Revised by BJ, 14-Jul-2023.)

blocks.name: 0nelrel
blocks.content: A binary relation does not contain the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2021.)

thm vtoclr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3)
  ‚ä£ Rel(c1)
  ‚ä£ ((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]s2)‚Üí s0[c1]s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  pm2.43i((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3)
  imp(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3, ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  syl2im(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3, ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  brrelex12i(c0, c1, c2)
  brrelex2i(c2, c1, c3)
  vtocl2g(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, universe, (c3 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3)), (c3 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s0[c1]c3)), (c3 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí((c0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3)))
  imbi2d(s0 = c0, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s0[c1]c3), ((c0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, (s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3), s0[c1]c3, (c0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3)
  anbi1d(s0 = c0, s0[c1]s1, s1[c1]c3, c0[c1]s1)
  breq1(s0, c0, c1, s1)
  breq1(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  imbi2d(s1 = c2, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ((c0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3), ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  imbi1d(s1 = c2, (c0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3))
  anbi12d(s1 = c2, c0[c1]s1, s1[c1]c3, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  breq2(s1, c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(s1, c2, c1, c3)
  vtoclg(s2, c3, universe, ((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí s0[c1]c3), ((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]s2)‚Üí s0[c1]s2))
  imbi12d(s2 = c3, (s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]s2), s0[c1]s2, (s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3), s0[c1]c3)
  anbi2d(s2 = c3, s0[c1]s1, s1[c1]s2, s1[c1]c3)
  breq2(s2, c3, s1, c1)
  breq2(s2, c3, s0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ((c0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)

  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.wi.s(s1, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)

  diff.wbr.s(s2, s0, c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: opthprc
blocks.content: Justification theorem for an ordered pair definition that works for any classes, including proper classes. This is a possible definition implied by the footnote in [Jech] p. 78, which says, "The sophisticated reader will not object to our use of a pair of classes." (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2003.)
blocks.origin:

thm xpundir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  eqtr4i(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), cun(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wa(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))

blocks.content: Membership in universal class of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)

thm elvv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))))))
  elxp(s0, s1, c0, universe, universe)
  2exbii(s0, s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))))
  biantru(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.content: An ordered pair contains its union. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2006.)

thm elvvuni(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0))

  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wcel(cuni(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqeltri(cuni(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  uniop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  opi2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  eleq12d(cuni(c0), c0, cuni(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  unieq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  id(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
}

blocks.name: bropaex12
blocks.content: Two classes related by an ordered pair class builder are sets. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jan-2020.)

thm bropaex12(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylib(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c2), c1, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  elopaelxp(s0, s1, cop(c0, c2), w0)
  opelxp(c0, c2, universe, universe)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s1, c0, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0[c1]c2 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  ‚ä£ c1 = { < s0, s1 > | w0 }

} = {
  sylib(c0[c1]c2, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå), < c0, c2 > ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  sylbi(c0[c1]c2, < c0, c2 > ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå), < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 })

  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(< c0, c2 >, c1, { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  elopaelxp(s0, s1, < c0, c2 >, w0)
  opelxp(c0, c2, universe, universe)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.content: The law of concretion for a binary relation. Ordered pair membership in an ordered pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm brab2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), w0))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  biadanii(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), w0)
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstri(c1, cxp(c3, c4), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1)))
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c3, c4, w1)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1))))
  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c2), c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1)))
  opelopab2a(s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, w1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brab2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[c1]c2 ‚Üî((c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c4)‚àß w0))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ c1 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4)‚àß w1)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  biadanii(c0[c1]c2, (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c4), w0)
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstri(c1, (c3 √ó c4), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4)‚àß w1)})
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c3, c4, w1)
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c4), c0[c1]c2, w0, < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4)‚àß w1)})
  bitri(c0[c1]c2, < c0, c2 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4)‚àß w1)}, < c0, c2 > ‚àà c1)
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(< c0, c2 >, c1, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4)‚àß w1)})
  opelopab2a(s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, w1, w0)
}

blocks.content: Implicit substitution of class for ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-1995.)

thm optocl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  -| wceq(c1, cxp(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(c2, c3)), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c2, c3))))))
  elxp3(s0, s1, c0, c2, c3)
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c2, c3))), w0)
  imp(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c2, c3)), w0)
  syl5ib(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c2, c3)), w0, w1)
  sylbi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c2, c3)), w1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm optocl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c2 √ó c3)
  ‚ä£ (< s0, s1 > = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚Üí w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, c1, (c2 √ó c3), w0)
  sylbi(c0 ‚àà(c2 √ó c3), w0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(< s0, s1 > = c0 ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3)))))
  elxp3(s0, s1, c0, c2, c3)
  exlimivv(s0, s1, (< s0, s1 > = c0 ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3)), w0)
  imp(< s0, s1 > = c0, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3), w0)
  syl5ib(< s0, s1 > = c0, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3), w0, w1)
  sylbi(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c3), w1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  opelxp(s0, s1, c2, c3)
}

thm 2optocl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0)
  -| wceq(c1, cxp(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c2), wb(w2, w0))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4))), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), w0)
  optocl(s2, s3, c2, c1, c3, c4, wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wi(wcel(c0, c1), w2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c2), wcel(c0, c1), w2, w0)
  com12(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), wcel(c0, c1), w2)
  optocl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c4, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), w2), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), w1))
  imbi2d(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), w1, w2)
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), w1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s3, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s3), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s3), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
}

thm 2optocl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c3 √ó c4)
  ‚ä£ (< s0, s1 > = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (< s2, s3 > = c2 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ (((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4)‚àß(s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4))‚Üí w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  impcom(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, w0)
  optocl(s2, s3, c2, c1, c3, c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w2))
  imbi2d(< s2, s3 > = c2, c0 ‚àà c1, w2, w0)
  com12((s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4), c0 ‚àà c1, w2)
  optocl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c4, ((s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4)‚Üí w2), ((s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4)‚Üí w1))
  imbi2d(< s0, s1 > = c0, (s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4), w1, w2)
  ex((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4), (s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4), w1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s3, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, (s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, s2 ‚àà c3, s3 ‚àà c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s3, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.wi.s(s1, (s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c4), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s2 ‚àà c3, s3 ‚àà c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s3, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
}

thm 3optocl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w0)
  -| wceq(c1, cxp(c4, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c2), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cop(cv(s4), cv(s5)), c3), wb(w3, w0))
  -| wi(w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s3), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5))), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s5)

  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)

  -| diffsc(s3, c2)

  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c4)
  -| diffsc(s4, c5)
  -| diffsc(s5, c0)

  -| diffsc(s5, c2)
  -| diffsc(s5, c3)
  -| diffsc(s5, c4)
  -| diffsc(s5, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w3)
  -| diffsw(s3, w3)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
  -| diffsw(s5, w0)
} = {
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), w0)
  impcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), w0)
  optocl(s4, s5, c3, c1, c4, c5, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w3))
  imbi2d(wceq(cop(cv(s4), cv(s5)), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w3, w0)
  com12(wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w3)
  2optocl(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w3), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w1), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w1, w2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w2, w3)
  3expia(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s3), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w1)
  diff.wi.s(s4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s4, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s4, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s4, c2, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s5, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s5, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s5, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s5, c2, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s4), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s5), c5)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w2)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s4)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s5)
  diff.wi.s(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s4), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s5), c5)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s5)
  diff.wi.s(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5)), w3)
  diff.wa.s(s3, wcel(cv(s4), c4), wcel(cv(s5), c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s4), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s5), c5)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s5)
}

thm 3optocl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c4 √ó c5)
  ‚ä£ (< s0, s1 > = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w2))
  ‚ä£ (< s2, s3 > = c2 ‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w3))
  ‚ä£ (< s4, s5 > = c3 ‚Üí(w3 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ (((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c5)‚àß(s2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c5)‚àß(s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5))‚Üí w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, w3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, w0)
} = {
  3impa(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c1, w0)
  impcom((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà c1, w0)
  optocl(s4, s5, c3, c1, c4, c5, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w3))
  imbi2d(< s4, s5 > = c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w3, w0)
  com12((s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w3)
  2optocl(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, ((s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5)‚Üí w3), ((s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5)‚Üí w1), ((s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5)‚Üí w2))
  imbi2d(< s0, s1 > = c0, (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w1, w2)
  imbi2d(< s2, s3 > = c2, (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w2, w3)
  3expia((s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c5), (s2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c5), (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w1)
  diff.wi.s(s4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s4, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s4, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s4, c2, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s5, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s5, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s5, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s5, c2, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, s4 ‚àà c4, s5 ‚àà c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s4, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s5, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s5)
  diff.wi.s(s1, (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s4 ‚àà c4, s5 ‚àà c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s4, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s5, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s5)
  diff.wi.s(s2, (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s4 ‚àà c4, s5 ‚àà c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s4, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s5, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s5)
  diff.wi.s(s3, (s4 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s5 ‚àà c5), w3)
  diff.wa.s(s3, s4 ‚àà c4, s5 ‚àà c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s4, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s4)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s5, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s5)
}

blocks.content: Ordered pair membership in a relation. Special case. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1995.)

blocks.name: 0xp
blocks.content: The Cartesian product with the empty set is empty. Part of Theorem 3.13(ii) of [Monk1] p. 37. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0xp(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cxp(emptycls, c0), emptycls)
} = {

  nex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)))))
  nex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  mto(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  noel(cv(hs1))
  simprl(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  elxp(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(emptycls, c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

thm eqrel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))))
  bi2anan9(wrel(c0), wrel(c1), wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, c1, c0)
  eqss(c0, c1)
  2albiim(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
}

blocks.name: relssi
blocks.content: Inference from subclass principle for relations. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm relssi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, wss(c0, c1), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  ax-gen(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relssi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚äÜ c1
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ (< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  ax-mp((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))), Rel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  ax-gen(s1, (< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
}

blocks.name: relssdv
blocks.content: Deduction from subclass principle for relations. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2004.)

thm relssdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  syl(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relssdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí Rel(c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, (< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))), Rel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: eqrelriiv
blocks.content: Inference from extensionality principle for relations. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqrelriiv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wrel(c1)
  -| wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mp2an(wceq(c0, c1), wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  eqrelriv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqrelriiv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = c1
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ Rel(c1)
  ‚ä£ (< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mp2an(c0 = c1, Rel(c0), Rel(c1))
  eqrelriv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: eqbrriv
blocks.content: Inference from extensionality principle for relations. (Contributed by NM, 12-Dec-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqbrriv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wrel(c1)
  -| wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqbrriv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = c1
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ Rel(c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s0[c1]s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3bitr3i(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, s0[c0]s1, s0[c1]s1)
  df-br(s0, c0, s1)
  df-br(s0, c1, s1)
}

blocks.name: eqrelrdv
blocks.content: Deduce equality of relations from equivalence of membership. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 10-Oct-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqrelrdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wrel(c1)
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  eqrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

thm eqrelrdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ Rel(c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, c0 = c1, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, (< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  mp2an((c0 = c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))), Rel(c0), Rel(c1))
  eqrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: eqbrrdv
blocks.content: Deduction from extensionality principle for relations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqbrrdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  3bitr3g(w0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  eqrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

  syl2anc(w0, (c0 = c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))), Rel(c0), Rel(c1))

}

thm eqrelrdv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), w0), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  imp(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  syl5ibr(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), w0, wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

} = {
  impbid2(wss(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))))

  19.23vv(s0, s1, wex(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe))

blocks.name: eqrelrel
blocks.content: Extensionality principle for ordered triples (used by 2-place operations ~ df-oprab ), analogous to ~ eqrel . Use ~ relrelss to express the antecedent in terms of the relation predicate. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2008.)

  sylbir(wss(cun(c0, c1), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1)))))), wa(wss(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wss(c1, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe))))

  ssrelrel(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  ssrelrel(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0)
  eqss(c0, c1)
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0)))))), wal(s0, wa(wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1)))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0)))))))
  albii(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1)))), wa(wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1)))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0))))))

blocks.name: elrel
blocks.content: A member of a relation is an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: rel0
blocks.content: The empty set is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-1998.)

blocks.name: nrelv
blocks.content: The universal class is not a relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: relsng
blocks.content: A singleton is a relation iff it is a singleton on an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2013.) (Revised by BJ, 12-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: relsnb
blocks.content: An at-most-singleton is a relation iff it is empty (because it is a "singleton on a proper class") or it is a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by BJ, 26-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm relsnb(class c0) {
  |- wb(wrel(csn(c0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
} = {
  impbii(wrel(csn(c0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  sylib(wrel(csn(c0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  biimpcd(wrel(csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  relsng(c0, universe)
  imor(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  jaoi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(csn(c0)))
  sylbi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wrel(csn(c0)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  mpbiri(wceq(csn(c0), emptycls), wrel(csn(c0)), wrel(emptycls))
  rel0()
  releq(csn(c0), emptycls)
  ibir(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(csn(c0)))
  relsng(c0, cxp(universe, universe))
}

thm copsex2gb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr2ri(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), w1), wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), w1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

  pm5.32i(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1, w0)
}

blocks.content: Implicit substitution inference for ordered pairs. Compare ~ copsex2g . (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm copsex2ga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))))
  -| wi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseli(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe))
  xpss(c1, c2)
  baibr(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))))
  copsex2gb(s0, s1, c0, w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: reldif

blocks.name: reliun

  ralbii(s0, c0, wrel(c1), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))))

blocks.name: reliin
blocks.content: An indexed intersection is a relation if at least one of the member of the indexed family is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: reluni
blocks.content: The union of a class is a relation iff any member is a relation. Exercise 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: relint
blocks.content: The intersection of a class is a relation if at least one member is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: relopabiv
blocks.content: A class of ordered pairs is a relation. For a version without disjoint variable condition, but a longer proof using ~ ax-13 , see ~ relopabi . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jul-2023.)

thm relopabiv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {

  ssopab2i(s0, s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe)))
  a1i(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  df-xp(s0, s1, universe, universe)
  df-rel(c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm relopabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wrel(c0)
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0))
} = {

  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  abeq2i(hs0, c0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  eqtri(c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), copab(s0, s1, w0))
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  2eximi(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

  sylan(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))

thm relopabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = { < s0, s1 > | w0 }
} = {
  mpbir(Rel(c0), c0 ‚äÜ(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  ssriv(hs0, c0, (ùïå √ó ùïå))
  syl(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå), ‚àÉ(s1, hs0 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå)))
  3syl(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1, hs0 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >))))
  sylbi(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))))
  abeq2i(hs0, c0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))))
  eqtri(c0, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0)))}, { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  2eximi(s0, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0), hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  simpl(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0)
  syl(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >))))
  2eximi(s0, s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >))
  eqcoms(hs0, < s0, s1 >, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >))
  syl(< s0, s1 > = hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >), ‚àÉ(hs1,(s1 = hs1 ‚àß < s0, s1 > = hs0)))
  mpi(< s0, s1 > = hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1,(s1 = hs1 ‚àß < s0, s1 > = hs0)), ‚àÉ(hs1, s1 = hs1))
  ax6evr(hs1, s1)
  eximdv(hs1, < s0, s1 > = hs0, s1 = hs1, (s1 = hs1 ‚àß < s0, s1 > = hs0))
  pm3.21(< s0, s1 > = hs0, s1 = hs1)
  eximi(hs1, (s1 = hs1 ‚àß < s0, s1 > = hs0), hs0 = < s0, hs1 >)
  sylan(s1 = hs1, < s0, s1 > = hs0, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >, < s0, s1 > = < s0, hs1 >)
  opeq2(s1, hs1, s0)
  eqcomd(hs0, < s0, hs1 >, (< s0, s1 > = < s0, hs1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > = hs0))
  eqtr2(< s0, s1 >, < s0, hs1 >, hs0)
  excomim(s0, s1, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >))
  eximi(s1, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >)), hs0 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  sylibr(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >)), hs0 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå)))))
  2eximi(s0, hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >, (hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå)))
  jctr(hs0 = < s0, hs1 >, (s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))
  pm3.2i(s0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(s0)
  vex(hs1)
  abeq2i(hs0, (ùïå √ó ùïå), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå)))))
  eqtri((ùïå √ó ùïå), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))))}, { < s0, hs1 > |(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå)})
  df-xp(s0, hs1, universe, universe)
  df-opab(s0, hs1, hs0, (s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))
  ax5e(s1, hs0 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  df-rel(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((ùïå √ó ùïå))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.w(< s0, s1 > = hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, (ùïå √ó ùïå))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm relopabiALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wrel(c0)
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0))
} = {
  mpbir(wrel(c0), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  eqsstri(c0, cxp(universe, universe), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  eqtri(c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), copab(s0, s1, w0))
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  abssi(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(universe, universe)))
  opelvv(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(universe, universe))
  df-rel(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: relopab
blocks.content: A class of ordered pairs is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-1995.) Remove disjoint variable conditions. (Revised by Alan Sare, 9-Jul-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: mptrel
blocks.content: The maps-to notation always describes a relationship. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: reli
blocks.content: The identity relation is a relation. Part of Exercise 4.12(p) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: rele
blocks.content: The membership relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: opabid2
blocks.content: A relation expressed as an ordered pair abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2006.)

thm opabid2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  gen2(hs0, hs1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))

thm difopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {

} = {
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, cdif(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, wn(w1))))
  ax-mp(wrel(cdif(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  relopab(s0, s1, w0)
  reldif(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
  relopab(s0, s1, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, wn(w1)))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1)))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wa(w0, wn(w1)))))
  3bitr4ri(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1)))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wa(w0, wn(w1)))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wa(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)))), wa(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)))))
  sbcan(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)))
  sbcbii(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wa(w0, wn(w1))), wa(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1))))
  sbcan(s1, cv(hs1), w0, wn(w1))
  anbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1))))
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), w0)
  3bitr4ri(wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))), wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))))
  elv(hs0, wb(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))), wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1)))))
  sbcng(s0, cv(hs0), universe, wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))
  sbcbii(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1)))
  elv(hs1, wb(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))))
  sbcng(s1, cv(hs1), universe, w1)
  notbii(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1)))
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), w1)
  eldif(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wa(w0, wn(w1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, wn(w1))))

  opelopabsb(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, w0)

  elv(hs0, ([hs0 / s0]¬¨[hs1 / s1]w1 ‚Üî ¬¨[hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]w1))

blocks.name: inxp
blocks.content: The intersection of two Cartesian products. Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm inxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c3)), cin(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3)))))
  eqtri(cin(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))))
  inopab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3))))
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  an4(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  elin(cv(hs1), c1, c3)
  ineq12i(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c3)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(c1, c3))
}

thm inxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3))=((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)√ó(c1 ‚ãÇ c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), ((c0 ‚ãÇ c2)√ó(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)), ({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)} ‚ãÇ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)}), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c3))})
  eqtri(({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)} ‚ãÇ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)}), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c3))}, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3))})
  inopab(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)), (hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)))
  bitr4i(((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)), (hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)))
  an4(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c3)
  anbi12i(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c2), hs1 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c3), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3))
  elin(hs0, c0, c2)
  elin(hs1, c1, c3)
  ineq12i((c0 √ó c1), (c2 √ó c3), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c1)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)})
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c3)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, (c0 ‚ãÇ c2), (c1 ‚ãÇ c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c0 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ‚ãÇ c3))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 ‚ãÇ c3))
}

blocks.name: xpiindi
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over indexed intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

thm xpiindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpancom(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wrel(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wrel(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)))))
  jctil(wne(c0, emptycls), wrel(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wrel(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))))
  syl(wne(c0, emptycls), wrel(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2))))
  mpan2(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2)))
  relxp(c1, c2)
  r19.2z(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2)))
  reliin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  relxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  eqrelrdv2(hs0, hs1, cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  3bitr4g(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2))))
  3bitr4g(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  bicomd(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  r19.28zv(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  elv(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  eliin(s0, cv(hs1), universe, c0, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe))
  opex(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eliin(s0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.hs1.w(wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm xpiindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí(c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))= ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpancom(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))= ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)), (Rel((c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)))‚àß Rel(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)))))
  jctil(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, Rel((c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))), Rel(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2))))
  syl(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, Rel(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, Rel((c1 √ó c2))))
  mpan2(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, Rel((c1 √ó c2))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, Rel((c1 √ó c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c0, Rel((c1 √ó c2)))
  relxp(c1, c2)
  r19.2z(s0, c0, Rel((c1 √ó c2)))
  reliin(s0, c0, (c1 √ó c2))
  relxp(c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  eqrelrdv2(hs0, hs1, (c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c2)))
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)))
  bicomd(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)))
  r19.28zv(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c2)
  anbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c2))
  elv(hs1, (hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c2)))
  eliin(s0, hs1, universe, c0, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2))
  opelxp(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  opelxp(hs0, hs1, c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  ax-mp((< hs0, hs1 > ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2))‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c2))), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà ùïå)
  opex(hs0, hs1)
  eliin(s0, < hs0, hs1 >, universe, c0, (c1 √ó c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 √ó c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: xpriindi
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over relativized indexed intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpriindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61ine(c2, emptycls, wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)))))
  eqtr4d(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))), cxp(c0, c1), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  xpeq2d(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), c1, wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), c1, cin(c1, universe), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  ineq2d(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3), universe, wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6eq(ciin(s0, c2, c3), universe, ciin(s0, emptycls, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  iineq1(s0, c2, emptycls, c3)
  0iin(s0, c3)
  inv1(c1)
  syl6eq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))), cxp(c0, c1), cin(cxp(c0, c1), universe), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  ineq2d(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)), universe, wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6eq(ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)), universe, ciin(s0, emptycls, cxp(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  iineq1(s0, c2, emptycls, cxp(c0, c3))
  0iin(s0, cxp(c0, c3))
  inv1(cxp(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), wne(c2, emptycls))
  xpindi(c0, c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))
  ineq2d(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  xpiindi(s0, c2, c0, c3)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

thm xpriindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 √ó(c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3)))=((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61ine(c2, emptycls, (c0 √ó(c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3)))=((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3))))
  eqtr4d((c0 √ó(c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3))), ((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3))), (c0 √ó c1), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  xpeq2d(c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3)), c1, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  syl6eq((c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3)), c1, (c1 ‚ãÇ ùïå), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  ineq2d(c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3), universe, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  syl6eq(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3), universe, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ, c3), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  iineq1(s0, c2, emptycls, c3)
  0iin(s0, c3)
  inv1(c1)
  syl6eq(((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3))), (c0 √ó c1), ((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ ùïå), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  ineq2d((c0 √ó c1), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3)), universe, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  syl6eq(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3)), universe, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ,(c0 √ó c3)), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  iineq1(s0, c2, emptycls, (c0 √ó c3))
  0iin(s0, (c0 √ó c3))
  inv1((c0 √ó c1))
  syl5eq((c0 √ó(c1 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3))), ((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3))), ((c0 √ó c1)‚ãÇ(c0 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3))), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  xpindi(c0, c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3))
  ineq2d((c0 √ó c1), (c0 √ó ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3)), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 √ó c3)), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  xpiindi(s0, c2, c0, c3)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: eliunxp
blocks.content: Membership in a union of Cartesian products. Analogue of ~ elxp for nonconstant ` B ( x ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr2i(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  mpbir(wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  relxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  reliun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  elrel(s0, s1, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), c0)
  19.41(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  nfel2(s0, c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  nfiu1(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  exbii(s0, wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  bitr3i(wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))))
  19.41v(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  exbii(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  pm5.32i(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  opeliunxp(s0, cv(s1), c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  diff.ciun.s(s1, s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm eliunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr2i(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))), (‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, c0 = < s0, s1 >))‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2))), ‚àÉ(s0,(‚àÉ(s1, c0 = < s0, s1 >)‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2)))))
  pm4.71ri(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, c0 = < s0, s1 >)))
  mpan(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, c0 = < s0, s1 >)), Rel(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2))))
  mpbir(Rel(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó c2))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, Rel(({ s0 } √ó c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, Rel(({ s0 } √ó c2)))
  relxp({ s0 }, c2)
  reliun(s0, c1, ({ s0 } √ó c2))
