blocks.name: opeliunxp2
blocks.content: Membership in a union of Cartesian products. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm opeliunxp2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylbir(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), c1))
  df-br(c0, ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), c1)
  brrelex1i(c0, ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), c1)

  rgenw(s0, c2, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)))
  relxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)
  reliun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c2)
  vtoclg1f(s0, c0, universe, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4))), wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c3))))
  nfbi(s0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  nfel2(s0, cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)))
  nfiu1(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))
  nfv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(s0), c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  eleq2d(c1, c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  opeliunxp(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: raliunxp
blocks.content: Write a double restricted quantification as one universal quantifier. In this version of ~ ralxp , ` B ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm raliunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)))))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0))))
  bitr4i(wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0))), wi(wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))), w0))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))))
  eliunxp(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  19.23vv(s1, s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)))))
  alrot3(s0, s1, s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0))
  2albii(s1, s2, wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0))))
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0)))
  impexp(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0)
  ceqsalv(s0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))
  opex(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0)
  r2al(s1, s2, c0, c1, w1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}

  diff.wi.s(s0, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, s1 ‚àà c0, s2 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: rexiunxp
blocks.content: Write a double restricted quantification as one universal quantifier. In this version of ~ rexxp , ` B ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexiunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wn(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), wn(w0))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))))
  notbii(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))))
  bitri(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1))))
  raliunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  ralbii(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  ralnex(s2, c1, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s2, w0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,({ s1 } √ó c1)), w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))

  notbii(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,({ s1 } √ó c1)), ¬¨ w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,({ s1 } √ó c1)), ¬¨ w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ w1)))

blocks.name: ralxp
blocks.content: Universal quantification restricted to a Cartesian product is equivalent to a double restricted quantification. The hypothesis specifies an implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3i(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0))
  raleqi(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  raliunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, csn(cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = < s1, s2 > ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3i(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,({ s1 } √ó c1)), w0))
  raleqi(s0, ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,({ s1 } √ó c1)), (c0 √ó c1), w0)
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  raliunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, ({ s1 } √ó c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, { s1 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rexxp
blocks.content: Existential quantification restricted to a Cartesian product is equivalent to a double restricted quantification. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3i(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0))
  rexeqi(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  rexiunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, csn(cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: exopxfr
blocks.content: Transfer ordered-pair existence from/to single variable existence. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm exopxfr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cxp(universe, universe), w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitri(wrex(s0, cxp(universe, universe), w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)), wrex(s1, universe, wrex(s2, universe, w1)), wex(s1, wrex(s2, universe, w1)))
  rexxp(s0, s1, s2, universe, universe, w0, w1)
  rexv(s1, wrex(s2, universe, w1))
  exbii(s1, wrex(s2, universe, w1), wex(s2, w1))
  rexv(s2, w1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}

thm exopxfr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wrel(c0), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6bb(wrel(c0), wrex(s0, c0, w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1))), wrex(s0, cxp(universe, universe), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  rexbidv2(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe), wrel(c0), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  pm4.71rd(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1)

blocks.name: djussxp
blocks.content: Disjoint union is a subset of a Cartesian product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: ralxpf
blocks.content: Version of ~ ralxp with bound-variable hypotheses. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wral(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  3bitr4ri(wral(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wral(hs1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))), wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c1, wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))))

thm ralxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s2, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = < s1, s2 > ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1),[hs0 / s0]w0))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, (c0 √ó c1), w0)
  3bitr4ri(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1),[hs0 / s0]w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,[hs1 / s1]w1)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)))
  ralbii(hs1, c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,[hs1 / s1]w1), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c1,[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1))
  cbvralsv(s2, hs2, c1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  cbvral(s1, hs1, c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,[hs1 / s1]w1))
  nfv(hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1))
  nfral(s1, s2, c1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  ralbidv(s2, c1, s1 = hs1, w1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  ralxp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  sylbi(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, ([hs0 / s0]w0 ‚Üî[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > ‚àß < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >))))
  eqvinop(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs2)
  exlimi(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > ‚àß < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >)), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ‚Üî[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1))
  nfbi(s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfsb(s1, hs2, s2, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfs1v(s1, hs1, w1)
  exlimi(s2, (hs0 = < s1, s2 > ‚àß < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ‚Üî[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1))
  nfbi(s2, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfsb(s2, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfs1v(s2, hs2, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  sylan9bb(hs0 = < s1, s2 >, < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1, w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s0, < s1, s2 >, w0, w1)
  sylbi(< s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >, (w1 ‚Üî[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1), (s1 = hs1 ‚àß s2 = hs2))
  opth(s1, s2, hs1, hs2)
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  sylan9bb(s1 = hs1, s2 = hs2, w1, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  sbequ12(s1, hs1, w1)
  sbequ12(s2, hs2, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 √ó c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.wceq.s(s2, s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  diff.hs1.w([hs0 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs2.w([hs0 / s0]w0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)

  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: rexxpf
blocks.content: Version of ~ rexxp with bound-variable hypotheses. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wn(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wn(w0))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))))
  notbii(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))))
  bitri(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1))))
  ralxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  nfn(s1, w0)
  nfn(s2, w0)
  nfn(s0, w1)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  ralbii(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  ralnex(s2, c1, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1))
}

thm rexxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), ¬¨ w0), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  notbii(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), ¬¨ w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), ¬¨ w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ w1)))
  ralxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, ¬¨ w0, ¬¨ w1)

  notbid(s0 = < s1, s2 >, w0, w1)
  ralbii(s1, c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ w1), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1))
  ralnex(s2, c1, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, (c0 √ó c1), w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1))

blocks.name: iunxpf
blocks.content: Indexed union on a Cartesian product equals a double indexed union. The hypothesis specifies an implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c2)
  -| wnfc(s2, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3))), wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  rexxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3))), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, c1, c3))))
  eliun(s1, cv(hs0), c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3))
  rexbii(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, c1, c3)), wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  eliun(s2, cv(hs0), c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iunxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), c2)= ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = < s1, s2 > ‚Üí c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), c2), ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3)))
  3bitr4i(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), c2), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c3)))
  rexxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c3)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c3)
  eleq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s0 = < s1, s2 >)
  eliun(s0, hs0, (c0 √ó c1), c2)
  bitri(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c3)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3)))
  eliun(s1, hs0, c0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3))
  rexbii(s1, c0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c3))
  eliun(s2, hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, c3)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: opabbi2dv
blocks.content: Deduce equality of a relation and an ordered-pair class builder. Compare ~ abbi2dv . (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabbi2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, w1)))
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqr(c0, copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  opabid2(s0, s1, c0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), w1)
}

thm opabbi2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = { < s0, s1 > | w1 })
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(< s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqr(c0, { < s0, s1 > | w1 }, { < s0, s1 > | < s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 }, w0)
  ax-mp({ < s0, s1 > | < s0, s1 > ‚àà c0 } = c0, Rel(c0))
  opabid2(s0, s1, c0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: relop
blocks.content: A necessary and sufficient condition for a Kuratowski ordered pair to be a relation. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2008.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

  exbii(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c5), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c2), c4)))
  anbi12i(wbr(c0, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), c5), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c2), c4))
  df-br(c0, c5, cv(s0))
  df-br(cv(s0), c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: brcogw

blocks.origin:
thm brcogw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wa(wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2))), wbr(c0, ccom(c7, c6), c2))
} = {
  syl2an2r(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wa(wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2)), wbr(c0, ccom(c7, c6), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c2))))
  3simpa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  3ad2antl3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wa(wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2)), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c2))))
  imp(wcel(c4, c5), wa(wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2)), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c2))))
  spcegv(hs0, c4, c5, wa(wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c2), wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c4, c0, c6)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c4, c7, c2)
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c7, c2))), wbr(c0, ccom(c7, c6), c2))
  brcog(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c7, c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, c6, c4), wbr(c4, c7, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

  spcegv(hs0, c4, c5, (c0[c6]c4 ‚àß c4[c7]c2), (c0[c6]hs0 ‚àß hs0[c7]c2))

blocks.name: eqbrrdva
blocks.content: Deduction from extensionality principle for relations, given an equivalence only on the relation domain and range. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqbrrdva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cxp(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cxp(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqbrrdv(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  sylibr(w0, wrel(c0), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6ss(c0, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  df-rel(c0)
  sylibr(w0, wrel(c1), wss(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6ss(c1, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  xpss(c2, c3)
  df-rel(c1)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  syl6ib(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(s1)))
  ssbrd(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  syl6ib(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(s1)))
  ssbrd(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  brxp(cv(s0), c2, c3, cv(s1))
  3expib(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqbrrdva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s0[c1]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqbrrdv(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  sylibr(w0, Rel(c0), c0 ‚äÜ(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  syl6ss(c0, (ùïå √ó ùïå), (c2 √ó c3), w0)
  df-rel(c0)
  sylibr(w0, Rel(c1), c1 ‚äÜ(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  syl6ss(c1, (ùïå √ó ùïå), (c2 √ó c3), w0)
  xpss(c2, c3)
  df-rel(c1)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, s0[c0]s1, s0[c1]s1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  syl6ib(w0, s0[c0]s1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), s0[(c2 √ó c3)]s1)
  ssbrd(s0, c0, s1, (c2 √ó c3), w0)
  syl6ib(w0, s0[c1]s1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), s0[(c2 √ó c3)]s1)
  ssbrd(s0, c1, s1, (c2 √ó c3), w0)
  brxp(s0, c2, c3, s1)
  3expib(w0, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c3, (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s0[c1]s1))
}

blocks.content: Move class substitution in and out of the converse of a relation. Version of ~ csbcnv with a sethood antecedent but depending on fewer axioms. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Feb-2017.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

thm csbcnvgALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, ccnv(c2))))
} = {
  syl6eqr(ccnv(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, ccnv(c2)), csb(s0, c0, copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  3eqtr4rd(ccnv(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs1, hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, c1))
  opabbidv(hs1, hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs1)))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(csb(s0, c0, cv(hs0)), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, cv(hs1))))
  sbcbr123(s0, c0, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  breq12d(csb(s0, c0, cv(hs0)), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wcel(c0, c1))
  csbconstg(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  csbconstg(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  csbopabgALT(s0, hs1, hs0, c0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(csb(s0, c0, c2)), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs1)))))

}

blocks.name: cnvco
blocks.content: Distributive law of converse over class composition. Theorem 26 of [Suppes] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

thm cnvco(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0))))))
  opabbii(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))))
  3bitr4i(wbr(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  exancom(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))
  brco(hs2, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  exbii(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))
  brcnv(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))
  vex(hs1)
  brcnv(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs2)
  vex(hs0)
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, ccom(c0, c1))

  diff.hs2.c(ccnv(c1))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(c0))

}

thm dfrn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtri(crn(c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), cdm(ccnv(c0)), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))))
  df-rn(c0)
  df-dm(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))

  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: ssrelrn
blocks.content: If a relation is a subset of a cartesian product, then for each element of the range of the relation there is an element of the first set of the cartesian product which is related to the element of the range by the relation. (Contributed by AV, 24-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssrelrn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crn(c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)))

} = {

  impcom(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3))))

  sylbid(wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wi(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)))), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)))
  elrng(s0, c3, crn(c0), c0)
  com23(wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3))))
  ex(wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wi(wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)))))
  eximdv(s0, wa(wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3)))
  adantl(wcel(c3, crn(c0)), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3))))

  df-rex(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c3))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà ran(c0))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c0]c3))

  eqtri(crn(copab(s0, s1, w0)), cab(s1, wex(s0, w0)), cab(s1, wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), copab(s0, s1, w0), cv(s1)))))
  dfrnf(s1, s0, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  nfopab1(s0, s1, w0)
  nfopab2(s1, s0, w0)
  abbii(s1, wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), copab(s0, s1, w0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, w0))
  exbii(s0, wbr(cv(s0), copab(s0, s1, w0), cv(s1)), w0)
  bitri(wbr(cv(s0), copab(s0, s1, w0), cv(s1)), w0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  df-br(cv(s0), copab(s0, s1, w0), cv(s1))
  opabid(s0, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: rnmpt
blocks.content: The range of a function in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), crn(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  rnopab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  rneqi(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  eqtri(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), cmpt(s1, c1, c2))
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  abbii(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: elrnmpt

thm elrnmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crn(c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, crn(c2), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c0, c4))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm elrnmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

blocks.name: elrnmpt1s
blocks.content: Elementhood in an image set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrnmpt1s(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  rspceeqv(s0, c0, c1, c2, c2, c5)
  biimparc(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  elrnmpt(s0, c2, c3, c4, c1, c5)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {

  eqid(c2)
  rspceeqv(s0, c0, c1, c2, c2, c5)
  biimparc(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 = c5), c2 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà ran(c4))

}

thm elrnmpt1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, crn(c3)))

  biantrud(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  elab2g(hs1, c1, c2, crn(c3), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl5bb(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))))
  df-rex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1))

  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  eleq12d(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  exbidv(hs0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  df-rex(s0, c0, hs1 = c1)

blocks.name: elrnmptg
blocks.content: Membership in the range of a function. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)

thm elrnmptg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl5bb(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  eleq2i(c3, crn(c4), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c4, c0, c1)
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1))), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, universe)))
  ex(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1))), wcel(c3, universe), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1))))
  r19.29(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  elexd(c3, c2, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1)))
  biimparc(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  eleq1(c3, c1, c2)
  elab3g(hs0, c3, universe, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c3, c1))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà ran(c4)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c3 = c1)))

  r19.29(s0, c0, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 = c1)

  eleq1(c3, c1, c2)
  elab3g(hs0, c3, universe, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c3 = c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 = c1))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c3, hs0 = c1, c3 = c1)

blocks.name: riinint
blocks.content: Express a relative indexed intersection as an intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm riinint(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))), wceq(cin(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4d(cin(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), cin(c0, cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  ineq2d(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))), wceq(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, universe)))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, universe)))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, universe))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, universe))
  ssexg(c3, c0, c1)
  dfiin3g(s0, c2, c3, universe)
  syl5eq(cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), cin(c0, cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), cin(cint(csn(c0)), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  intun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  ineq1d(cint(csn(c0)), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0)), wceq(cint(csn(c0)), c0))
  intsng(c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)))

}

thm dmcoss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1))

  exlimi(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(c0, c1)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfe1(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(c0, c1)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))
  exsimpl(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))
  opelco(hs2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  cbvexvw(hs1, hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0), c1)
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1))
  eldm(hs1, cv(hs0), c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c1))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

  syl6com(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))

  biimpi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))

thm elinxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbii(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))))

  mpan(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, c0 = < s0, s1 >)), Rel((c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3))))
  relinxp(c1, c2, c3)
  elrel(s0, s1, (c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), c0)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), c0 = < s0, s1 >, ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  syl6ib(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), c0 = < s0, s1 >, ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)), (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  ancld(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), c0 = < s0, s1 >, ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  syl6com(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), c0 = < s0, s1 >, ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))
  biimpd(c0 = < s0, s1 >, c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))
  biimpi(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  an12(c0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)
  r2ex(s0, s1, c2, c3, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  rexlimivv(s0, s1, c2, c3, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))
  impd((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), c0 = < s0, s1 >, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))
  syl9((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), c0 = < s0, s1 >, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))
  simplbi2((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))
  opelinxp(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  biimprd(c0 = < s0, s1 >, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)), c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c3)))

blocks.name: elres
blocks.content: Membership in a restriction. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 9-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm elres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, universe, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  eleq2i(c0, cres(c1, c2), cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe)))
  df-res(c1, c2)
  elinxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, universe)
  rexbii(s0, c2, wrex(s1, universe, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  rexv(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)

  eleq2i(c0, (c1 |` c2), (c1 ‚ãÇ(c2 √ó ùïå)))
  df-res(c1, c2)

  rexbii(s0, c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ùïå,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)), ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  rexv(s1, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))

  2eximdv(s0, s1, c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2), c0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  syl6ib(c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2), c0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)), (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  ancld(c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2), c0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  syl6com(c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2), c0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  biimpd(c0 = < s0, s1 >, c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  ancomd(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2), s0 ‚àà c2, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)
  biimpi(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2), (< s0, s1 > ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))
  an12(c0 = < s0, s1 >, s0 ‚àà c2, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)
  3bitri(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))))
  rexcom4(s0, s1, c2, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  exbii(s1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))))
  df-rex(s0, c2, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1))
  excom(s1, s0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)))
  rexlimiv(s0, c2, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1)), c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  exlimdv(s1, s0 ‚àà c2, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  impd(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 = < s0, s1 >, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  syl9(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 = < s0, s1 >, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  simplbi2com(s0 ‚àà c2, < s0, s1 > ‚àà c1, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  opelresOLD2(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  vex(s1)
  biimprd(c0 = < s0, s1 >, < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c1 |` c2), c0 ‚àà(c1 |` c2))
  eleq1(c0, < s0, s1 >, (c1 |` c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (c1 |` c2))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (c1 |` c2))
  diff.cres.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c2)

  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

blocks.name: elsnres
blocks.content: Membership in restriction to a singleton. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm elsnres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cres(c1, csn(c2))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cres(c1, csn(c2))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(hs0, csn(c2), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))), wex(s0, wrex(hs0, csn(c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  elres(hs0, s0, c0, c1, csn(c2))
  rexcom4(hs0, s0, csn(c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))
  exbii(s0, wrex(hs0, csn(c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
  rexsn(hs0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1), wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1))
  eqeq2d(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cop(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cop(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elsnres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 |` { c2 })‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 = < c2, s0 > ‚àß < c2, s0 > ‚àà c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(c0 ‚àà(c1 |` { c2 }), ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 = < c2, s0 > ‚àß < c2, s0 > ‚àà c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà { c2 }, ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 = < hs0, s0 > ‚àß < hs0, s0 > ‚àà c1))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà { c2 },(c0 = < hs0, s0 > ‚àß < hs0, s0 > ‚àà c1))))
  elres(hs0, s0, c0, c1, { c2 })
  rexcom4(hs0, s0, { c2 }, (c0 = < hs0, s0 > ‚àß < hs0, s0 > ‚àà c1))
  exbii(s0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà { c2 },(c0 = < hs0, s0 > ‚àß < hs0, s0 > ‚àà c1)), (c0 = < c2, s0 > ‚àß < c2, s0 > ‚àà c1))
  rexsn(hs0, c2, (c0 = < hs0, s0 > ‚àß < hs0, s0 > ‚àà c1), (c0 = < c2, s0 > ‚àß < c2, s0 > ‚àà c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, c0 = < hs0, s0 >, < hs0, s0 > ‚àà c1, c0 = < c2, s0 >, < c2, s0 > ‚àà c1)
  eqeq2d(c0, < hs0, s0 >, < c2, s0 >, hs0 = c2)
  eleq1d(< hs0, s0 >, c1, < c2, s0 >, hs0 = c2)
  opeq1(hs0, c2, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 = < c2, s0 > ‚àß < c2, s0 > ‚àà c1))
}

blocks.name: relssres
blocks.content: Simplification law for restriction. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm relssres(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)), wceq(cres(c0, c1), c0))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)), wceq(cres(c0, c1), c0), wa(wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(c0, cres(c0, c1))))
  jctil(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)), wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(c0, cres(c0, c1)))
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, c0, cres(c0, c1), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)))
  simpl(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1))
  adantl(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1))))
  syl6ibr(wss(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  ancrd(wss(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl5(wss(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  ssel(cdm(c0), c1, cv(hs0))
  opelresi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  resss(c0, c1)
  eqss(cres(c0, c1), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cres(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relssres(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c0 |` c1)= c0)
} = {
  sylibr((Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚äÜ c1), (c0 |` c1)= c0, ((c0 |` c1)‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c0 |` c1)))
  jctil((Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚äÜ c1), (c0 |` c1)‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚äÜ(c0 |` c1))
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, c0, (c0 |` c1), (Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚äÜ c1))
  simpl(Rel(c0), dom(c0)‚äÜ c1)
  adantl(Rel(c0), dom(c0)‚äÜ c1, (< hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c0 ‚Üí < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c0 |` c1)))
  syl6ibr(dom(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c0 |` c1), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c0))
  ancrd(dom(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  syl5(dom(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà dom(c0))
  opeldm(hs0, hs1, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  ssel(dom(c0), c1, hs0)
  opelresi(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  resss(c0, c1)
  eqss((c0 |` c1), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 |` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((c0 |` c1))
  diff.hs0.w((Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚äÜ c1))
  diff.hs1.w((Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚äÜ c1))
}

blocks.name: dmressnsn
blocks.content: The domain of a restriction to a singleton is a singleton. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: eldmressnsn
blocks.content: The element of the domain of a restriction to a singleton is the element of the singleton. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: eldmeldmressn
blocks.content: An element of the domain (of a relation) is an element of the domain of the restriction (of the relation) to the singleton containing this element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)

blocks.name: resdm
blocks.content: A relation restricted to its domain equals itself. (Contributed by NM, 12-Dec-2006.)

blocks.name: resexg
blocks.content: The restriction of a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: resex
blocks.content: The restriction of a set is a set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: resindm
blocks.content: When restricting a relation, intersecting with the domain of the relation has no effect. (Contributed by FL, 6-Oct-2008.)

blocks.name: resdmdfsn
blocks.content: Restricting a relation to its domain without a set is the same as restricting the relation to the universe without this set. (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: resopab
blocks.content: Restriction of a class abstraction of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm resopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cres(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtri(cres(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe)))
  df-res(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0)
  eqtri(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cin(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  eqtri(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe)), cin(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ineq2i(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqtr4i(cxp(c0, universe), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe))))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c0, universe)
  opabbii(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe)))
  biantru(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  incom(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  inopab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm resopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } |` c0)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  eqtri(({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } |` c0), { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}, ({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó ùïå)))
  df-res({ < s0, s1 > | w0 }, c0)
  eqtri(({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó ùïå)), { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}, ({ < s0, s1 > | s0 ‚àà c0 } ‚ãÇ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }))
  eqtri(({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó ùïå)), ({ < s0, s1 > | s0 ‚àà c0 } ‚ãÇ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }), ({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚ãÇ { < s0, s1 > | s0 ‚àà c0 }))
  ineq2i({ < s0, s1 > | w0 }, (c0 √ó ùïå), { < s0, s1 > | s0 ‚àà c0 })
  eqtr4i((c0 √ó ùïå), { < s0, s1 > | s0 ‚àà c0 }, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà ùïå)})
  df-xp(s0, s1, c0, universe)
  opabbii(s0, s1, s0 ‚àà c0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà ùïå))

}

blocks.name: iss
blocks.content: A subclass of the identity function is the identity function restricted to its domain. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm iss(class c0) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, cid), wceq(c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0))))
} = {
  impbii(wss(c0, cid), wceq(c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0))))
  mpbird(wss(c0, cid), wceq(c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(cid, cdm(c0)))))))
  alrimivv(hs0, hs1, wss(c0, cid), wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(cid, cdm(c0)))))
  syl6bbr(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid)))
  impbid(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid)))
  jcad(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid))
  a1i(wss(c0, cid), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  impcomd(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  syl5bi(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  syl5ibcom(wss(c0, cid), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syl5bi(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  exlimdv(hs1, wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  sylcom(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid))
  ssel(c0, cid, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  syl5bi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1))
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))

thm elrid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cres(cid, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {

  eleq2i(c0, cres(cid, c1), cin(cid, cxp(c1, universe)))
  df-res(cid, c1)
  elidinxp(s0, c0, c1, universe)
  rexeqi(s0, cin(c1, universe), c1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  inv1(c1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm opabresid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  eqtr3i(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), cres(cid, c0), cres(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c0))
  resopab(s0, s1, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  reseq1i(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c0, cid)
  eqtr4i(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cid, copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

  elv(s0, wb(wbr(cv(s1), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))

  abbii(hs1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  bitri(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  anbi1ci(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

  df-br(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1))
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  equsexvw(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))

blocks.name: csbima12
blocks.content: Move class substitution in and out of the image of a function. (Contributed by FL, 15-Dec-2006.) (Revised by NM, 20-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbima12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(c0, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(csb(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), csb(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cima(c1, c2))
  imaeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), cima(c1, c2), cima(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfima(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  imaeq12d(c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eqtrd(csb(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2))
  syl6req(emptycls, cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  imaeq2d(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  ima0(csb(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cima(c1, c2)), cima(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm imasng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cima(c2, csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cima(c2, csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(cima(c2, csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0))), cab(s0, wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  dfima2(s0, hs0, c2, csn(c0))
  abbidv(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  rexsng(hs0, c0, universe, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
}

  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà(c1 " { c2 }), < c2, c0 > ‚àà c1, c2[c1]c0)
  elab2(hs0, c0, (c1 " { c2 }), c2[c1]c0, c2[c1]hs0)
  breq2(hs0, c0, c2, c1)
  ax-mp((c1 " { c2 })= { hs0 | c2[c1]hs0 }, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  imasng(hs0, c2, universe, c1)
  df-br(c2, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c2[c1]c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.content: Membership in an image of a singleton. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 21-Oct-2006.)

thm elimasng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cima(c4, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4)))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wb(wcel(c2, cima(c4, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, csn(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c4)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c4)))

  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cima(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), cima(c4, csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  imaeq2d(c4, csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs1), c0)
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c4, cop(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c4), wcel(c2, cima(c4, csn(c0))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, cima(c4, csn(c0)))
  eleq1d(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c4, cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  elimasn(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))

}

thm elimasng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

blocks.name: args
blocks.content: Two ways to express the class of unique-valued arguments of ` F ` , which is the same as the domain of ` F ` whenever ` F ` is a function. The left-hand side of the equality is from Definition 10.2 of [Quine] p. 65. Quine uses the notation "arg ` F ` " for this class (for which we have no separate notation). Observe the resemblance to the alternate definition ~ dffv4 of function value, which is based on the idea in Quine's definition. (Contributed by NM, 8-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm args(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1))))), cab(s0, weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)))), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  bitr4i(wex(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)))), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wceq(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), csn(cv(s1)))))
  exbii(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), csn(cv(s1))))
  eqeq1i(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)), cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  elv(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  imasng(s1, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  euabsn(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: eliniseg
blocks.content: Membership in an initial segment. The idiom ` ( ``' A " { B } ) ` , meaning ` { x | x A B } ` , is used to specify an initial segment in (for example) Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: epini
blocks.content: Any set is equal to its preimage under the converse epsilon relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: iniseg
blocks.content: An idiom that signifies an initial segment of an ordering, used, for example, in Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm iniseg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  abbi2dv(s0, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))
  eliniseg(c0, universe, cv(s0), c2)
  vex(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c2), csn(c0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dffr3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of well-founded relation. Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffr3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls)))))
  dffr2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls))), wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls))))
  imbi2i(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls)))
  rexbii(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls, crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))))
  eqtr4i(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), cin(cv(s0), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ineq2i(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1))), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))))
  elv(s1, wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1))), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  iniseg(hs0, cv(s1), universe, c0)

blocks.name: cotrg
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that the composition of two relations is included in a third relation. See its special instance ~ cotr for the main application. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.) Generalized from its special instance ~ cotr . (Revised by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)

thm cotrg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2))))), wrel(ccom(c0, c1)))
  relopabi(s0, s2, ccom(c0, c1), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  df-co(s0, s2, s1, c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s2, ccom(c0, c1), c2)
  albii(s0, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))
  bitri(wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))), wal(s2, wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))
  albii(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))
  bitr4i(wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wi(wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))
  opelco(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2), c0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s2)
  bicomi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))
  df-br(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))
  19.23v(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))
  alcom(s2, s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))

  diff.ccom.s(s2, c0, c1)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)

  ax-mp(((c0 ‚àò c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s2,(< s0, s2 > ‚àà(c0 ‚àò c1)‚Üí < s0, s2 > ‚àà c2)))), Rel((c0 ‚àò c1)))

  df-co(s0, s2, s1, c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s2, (c0 ‚àò c1), c2)
  albii(s0, ‚àÄ(s2,(< s0, s2 > ‚àà(c0 ‚àò c1)‚Üí < s0, s2 > ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s2,(< s0, s2 > ‚àà(c0 ‚àò c1)‚Üí < s0, s2 > ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))), ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))))
  albii(s2, (< s0, s2 > ‚àà(c0 ‚àò c1)‚Üí < s0, s2 > ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s1,((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2)))
  bitr4i((< s0, s2 > ‚àà(c0 ‚àò c1)‚Üí < s0, s2 > ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s1,((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2)), (‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2))‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  imbi12i(< s0, s2 > ‚àà(c0 ‚àò c1), < s0, s2 > ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)), s0[c2]s2)
  opelco(s1, s0, s2, c0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s2)
  bicomi(< s0, s2 > ‚àà c2, s0[c2]s2)
  df-br(s0, c2, s2)
  19.23v(s1, (s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2), s0[c2]s2)
  alcom(s2, s1, ((s0[c1]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c2]s2))
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.ccom.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, c2, s2)

blocks.name: cotr
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive. Definition of transitivity in [Schechter] p. 51. Special instance of ~ cotrg . (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.)

blocks.name: idrefALT

The "proof modification is discouraged" tag is here only because this is an *ALT result. (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cnvsym
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is symmetric. Similar to definition of symmetry in [Schechter] p. 51. (Contributed by NM, 28-Dec-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvsym(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))))
  alcom(s1, s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0))))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  ssrel(s1, s0, ccnv(c0), c0)
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))
  imbi12i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  df-br(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))
  df-br(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
}

  imbi12i(s0[c0]s1, s1[c0]s0, < s1, s0 > ‚àà `' c0, < s1, s0 > ‚àà c0)

blocks.name: intasym
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is antisymmetric. Definition of antisymmetry in [Schechter] p. 51. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

thm intasym(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wss(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wss(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid)))))
  mp2b(wb(wss(cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid))))), wrel(ccnv(c0)), wrel(cin(c0, ccnv(c0))))

  ssrel(s0, s1, cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), cid)
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccnv(c0))))
  elin(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, ccnv(c0))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccnv(c0)))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccnv(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  df-br(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cid, cv(s1)))
  df-br(cv(s0), cid, cv(s1))
  ideq(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, ccnv(c0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c0, ccnv(c0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cid.s(s1)
}

  albii(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wb(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

  bibi1i(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: intirr
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is irreflexive. Definition of irreflexivity in [Schechter] p. 51. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

thm intirr(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wceq(cin(c0, cid), emptycls), wal(s0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))))

} = {

  3bitri(wceq(cin(c0, cid), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0))))), wceq(cin(cid, c0), emptycls), wss(cid, cdif(universe, c0)))
  eqeq1i(cin(c0, cid), emptycls, cin(cid, c0))
  incom(c0, cid)
  disj2(cid, c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cid, cdif(universe, c0)), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)))))), wrel(cid))
  reli()
  ssrel(s0, hs0, cid, cdif(universe, c0))
  2albii(s0, hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0))))
  imbi12i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)))
  3bitr2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cid, cv(hs0)))
  equcom(hs0, s0)
  ideq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  df-br(cv(s0), cid, cv(hs0))
  xchnxbir(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  bitr4i(wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), universe), wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  biantrur(wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), universe))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  eldif(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), universe, c0)
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  albii(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  equsalvw(hs0, s0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s0), c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.universe.s(s0)

thm brcodir(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(c4), c4), c2), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(c4), c4), c2), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2))))

  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0)))
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
