  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  3bitr4i(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c1)
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2), cv(s1)))
  df-br(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2), cv(s1))
  el2v(s0, s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))
  brcodir(s2, cv(s0), universe, cv(s1), universe, c2)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)))))), wrel(cxp(c0, c1)))
  relxp(c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s0, ccnv(c2), c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s1, ccnv(c2), c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
}

thm codir(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(`' c2 ‚àò c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(`' c2 ‚àò c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2))))), d(s2, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(`' c2 ‚àò c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2))))), d(s2, c1))
  3bitr4i((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(`' c2 ‚àò c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)))), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1)‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà(`' c2 ‚àò c2)))), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, (< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1)‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà(`' c2 ‚àò c2)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2))))
  imbi12i(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(`' c2 ‚àò c2), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)))
  opelxp(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  bitr3i(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(`' c2 ‚àò c2), ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)), s0[(`' c2 ‚àò c2)]s1)
  df-br(s0, (`' c2 ‚àò c2), s1)
  el2v(s0, s1, (s0[(`' c2 ‚àò c2)]s1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2))))
  brcodir(s2, s0, universe, s1, universe, c2)
  ax-mp(((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(`' c2 ‚àò c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1)‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà(`' c2 ‚àò c2))))), Rel((c0 √ó c1)))
  relxp(c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, (c0 √ó c1), (`' c2 ‚àò c2))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, ‚àÉ(s2,(s0[c2]s2 ‚àß s1[c2]s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s0, `' c2, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s1, `' c2, c2)

}

blocks.name: qfto
blocks.content: A quantifier-free way of expressing the total order predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm qfto(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c1)
  3bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1))))
  brun(cv(s0), c2, ccnv(c2), cv(s1))
  df-br(cv(s0), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(s1))
  orbi2i(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))))))), wrel(cxp(c0, c1)))
  relxp(c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c2, ccnv(c2))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s1, c2, ccnv(c2))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
}

thm qfto(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1)‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2)))), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0)))))
  2albii(s0, s1, (< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1)‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0)))
  imbi12i(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), (s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0))
  opelxp(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3bitr3i(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2), (s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0), s0[(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2)]s1, (s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s0[`' c2]s1))
  brun(s0, c2, `' c2, s1)
  df-br(s0, (c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2), s1)
  orbi2i(s0[c2]s1, s0[`' c2]s1, s1[c2]s0)
  brcnv(s0, c2, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  ax-mp(((c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(< s0, s1 > ‚àà(c0 √ó c1)‚Üí < s0, s1 > ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2))))), Rel((c0 √ó c1)))
  relxp(c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, (c0 √ó c1), (c2 ‚ãÉ `' c2))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, (s0[c2]s1 ‚à® s1[c2]s0))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c2, `' c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s1, c2, `' c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
}

blocks.name: xpidtr
blocks.content: A square Cartesian product ` ( A X. A ) ` is a transitive relation. (Contributed by FL, 31-Jul-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpidtr(class c0) {
  |- wss(ccom(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(c0, c0)), cxp(c0, c0))
} = {
  mpbir(wss(ccom(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(c0, c0)), cxp(c0, c0)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))))
  ax-gen(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))))
  imp(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  brxp(cv(hs0), c0, c0, cv(hs1))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))
  simplbiim(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  brxp(cv(hs1), c0, c0, cv(hs2))
  simplbi2com(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))
  brxp(cv(hs0), c0, c0, cv(hs2))
  cotr(hs0, hs1, hs2, cxp(c0, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c0, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cxp(c0, c0))
}

thm xpidtr(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 √ó c0)‚àò(c0 √ó c0))‚äÜ(c0 √ó c0)
} = {
  mpbir(((c0 √ó c0)‚àò(c0 √ó c0))‚äÜ(c0 √ó c0), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(hs1, ‚àÄ(hs2,((hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs1 ‚àß hs1[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2)‚Üí hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2)))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, ‚àÄ(hs2,((hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs1 ‚àß hs1[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2)‚Üí hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2)))
  ax-gen(hs2, ((hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs1 ‚àß hs1[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2)‚Üí hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2))

  sylbi(hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs1, (hs1[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2 ‚Üí hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  brxp(hs0, c0, c0, hs1)
  adantr(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c0, (hs1[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2 ‚Üí hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2))

  simplbiim(hs1[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0[(c0 √ó c0)]hs2), hs1 ‚àà c0, hs2 ‚àà c0)

}

blocks.name: trin2
blocks.content: The intersection of two transitive classes is transitive. (Contributed by FL, 31-Jul-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm trin2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)), wss(ccom(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c1)), cin(c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)), wss(ccom(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c1)), cin(c0, c1)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))))))
  imp(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))))))

blocks.content: A partial order relation is irreflexive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Nov-2015.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)

  |- wi(wpo(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), emptycls))

  brin(cv(hs0), c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))
  pm2.21d(wpo(c0, c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  sylib(wpo(c0, c1), wn(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))))

  syl5ibcom(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))))
  poirr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  notbid(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: trinxp
blocks.content: The relation induced by a transitive relation on a part of its field is transitive. (Taking the intersection of a relation with a square Cartesian product is a way to restrict it to a subset of its field.) (Contributed by FL, 31-Jul-2009.)

blocks.name: soirri
blocks.content: A strict order relation is irreflexive. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)

blocks.name: sotri
blocks.content: A strict order relation is a transitive relation. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  -| wor(c1, c4)
  -| wss(c1, cxp(c4, c4))
} = {
  mpcom(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))))
  anim12i(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3), wcel(c0, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4)))
  simpld(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c4, c4)
  brel(c2, c1, c3, c4, c4)
  3expb(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wor(c1, c4))
  sotr(c1, c4, c0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sotri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚â∫ c4
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚äÜ(c4 √ó c4)
} = {
  mpcom((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3, (c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4)))

  simpld(c0[c1]c2, c0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c4)
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c4, c4)
  brel(c2, c1, c3, c4, c4)
  3expb(c0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4, ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  mpan((c0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4), ((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3), c1 ‚â∫ c4)
  sotr(c1, c4, c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: son2lpi

blocks.name: cnvopab
blocks.content: The converse of a class abstraction of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

thm cnvopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)), copab(s1, s0, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)), copab(s1, s0, w0))
  relcnv(copab(s0, s1, w0))
  relopab(s1, s0, w0)
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s1, s0, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(hs1, s0, w0)))
  opelopabsbALT(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, w0)
  sbcom2(hs0, s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), copab(s0, s1, w0))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelopabsbALT(hs0, hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s1, s0, w0))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s1, s0, w0))
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mptcnv
blocks.content: The converse of a mapping function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmpt(s1, c2, c3), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))), w0)
  opabbidv(s1, s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  eqtri(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), ccnv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  cnveqi(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))))
  df-mpt(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  cnvopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm cnv0() {
  |- wceq(ccnv(emptycls), emptycls)
} = {
  nel0(hs0, ccnv(emptycls))
  mtbir(wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(emptycls)), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))))
  nex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))))
  nex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))
  intnan(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  br0(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  abeq2i(hs0, ccnv(emptycls), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))))
  eqtri(ccnv(emptycls), cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))))), copab(hs1, hs2, wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))
  df-cnv(hs1, hs2, emptycls)
  df-opab(hs1, hs2, hs0, wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(emptycls))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))
}

thm cnvun(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(cun(c0, c1)), cun(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
} = {
  eqtr4i(ccnv(cun(c0, c1)), cun(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)), cun(copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  eqtr4i(ccnv(cun(c0, c1)), cun(copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cv(hs1))))
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, cun(c0, c1))
  eqtr4i(cun(copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  unopab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  opabbii(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  brun(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  uneq12i(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, c0)
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: cnvdif
blocks.content: Distributive law for converse over class difference. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2014.)

  sylancr(wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(ciun(s1, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c3)), cxp(c0, universe)), emptycls), wss(ciun(s1, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c3)), cxp(c1, universe)), wceq(cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(c0, universe)), emptycls))

blocks.name: resdisj
blocks.content: A double restriction to disjoint classes is the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: rnxp
blocks.content: The range of a Cartesian product. Part of Theorem 3.13(x) of [Monk1] p. 37. (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2004.)

blocks.name: dmxpss
blocks.content: The domain of a Cartesian product is a subclass of the first factor. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: rnxpss
blocks.content: The range of a Cartesian product is a subclass of the second factor. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2006.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: rnxpid
blocks.content: The range of a square Cartesian product. (Contributed by FL, 17-May-2010.)

  syl6ss(c0, c2, dom((c2 √ó c3)), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3)))
  eqsstr3d(c0, dom((c2 √ó c3)), dom((c0 √ó c1)), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3)))
  adantr((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3), dom((c0 √ó c1))= c0)
  sylbir((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, dom((c0 √ó c1))= c0, (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  adantl(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, dom((c0 √ó c1))= c0)
  dmxp(c1, c0)
  adantl((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3), dom((c0 √ó c1))‚äÜ dom((c2 √ó c3)))
  dmss((c0 √ó c1), (c2 √ó c3))
  dmxpss(c2, c3)
  syl6ss(c1, c3, ran((c2 √ó c3)), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3)))
  eqsstr3d(c1, ran((c2 √ó c3)), ran((c0 √ó c1)), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3)))
  adantr((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3), ran((c0 √ó c1))= c1)
  sylbir((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, ran((c0 √ó c1))= c1, (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  xpnz(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ran((c0 √ó c1))= c1)
  rnxp(c0, c1)
  adantl((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3), ran((c0 √ó c1))‚äÜ ran((c2 √ó c3)))
  rnss((c0 √ó c1), (c2 √ó c3))
  rnxpss(c2, c3)
  xpss12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: xp11
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of nonempty classes is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm xp11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  sylbi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls))
  xpnz(c0, c1)
  com12(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  sylbid(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)))
  syl5bbr(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  anidm(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls))
  anbi2d(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls))
  neeq1(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)
  syl6ib(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1))))
  anim12d(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))
  eqimss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  ssxpb(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5ibcom(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c0, c1)))
  eqimss2(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  ssxpb(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c1))))
  an4(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3), wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1))
  anbi12i(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c1)))
  eqss(c0, c2)
  eqss(c1, c3)
  xpeq12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
}

thm xp11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3)‚Üî(c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3)))
} = {
  impbid1((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), (c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3))
  sylbi((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3)‚Üí(c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3)), (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  xpnz(c0, c1)
  com12((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3))
  sylbid((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c2 √ó c3)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  syl5bbr((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c2 √ó c3)‚â† ‚àÖ), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  anidm((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  anbi2d((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2 √ó c3)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  neeq1((c0 √ó c1), (c2 √ó c3), emptycls)
  syl6ib((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), ((c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(c2 √ó c3)‚â† ‚àÖ), (c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3), ((c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c3)‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)))
  anim12d((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2 √ó c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c3), (c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  syl5ibcom((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c0 √ó c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c3), (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(c2 √ó c3))
  eqimss((c0 √ó c1), (c2 √ó c3))
  ssxpb(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5ibcom((c0 √ó c1)=(c2 √ó c3), (c2 √ó c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), (c2 √ó c3)‚äÜ(c0 √ó c1))
  eqimss2((c0 √ó c1), (c2 √ó c3))
  ssxpb(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  bitr4i(((c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c3)‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)), (c0 = c2 ‚àß c1 = c3), ((c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚àß(c1 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)))
  an4(c0 ‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚äÜ c3, c2 ‚äÜ c0, c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  anbi12i(c0 = c2, c1 = c3, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0), (c1 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  eqss(c0, c2)
  eqss(c1, c3)
  xpeq12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: xpcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  syl6bbr(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  xp11(c0, c1, c0, c2)
  biantrur(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0))
  eqid(c0)
  impbid1(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wne(c1, emptycls))), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylan2b(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wne(c1, emptycls)), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  nne(c1, emptycls)
  syl6an(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  simpr(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  sylbid(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  syl6bb(wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cxp(c0, c2)))
  eqeq1d(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2), emptycls, wceq(c1, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls, cxp(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  xpeq2(c1, emptycls, c0)
  xp0(c0)
  eqcom(emptycls, cxp(c0, c2))
  adantr(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)
  syl5bi(wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  xpeq0(c0, c2)
  orel1(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  eqtr3(c1, emptycls, c2)
  xpeq2(c1, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí((c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2)‚Üî c1 = c2))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ((c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2)‚Üî c1 = c2), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl6bbr((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), (c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2), c1 = c2, (c0 = c0 ‚àß c1 = c2))
  xp11(c0, c1, c0, c2)
  biantrur(c1 = c2, c0 = c0)
  eqid(c0)
  impbid1((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ¬¨ c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), (c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2), c1 = c2)
  sylan2b(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ((c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2)‚Üí c1 = c2), c1 = ‚àÖ)
  nne(c1, emptycls)
  syl6an((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 = ‚àÖ), (c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2), c1 = c2, c1 = ‚àÖ, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  simpr(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 = ‚àÖ)
  sylbid((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 = ‚àÖ), (c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2), c2 = ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c2)= ‚àÖ)
  adantl(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 = ‚àÖ, ((c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2)‚Üî(c0 √ó c2)= ‚àÖ))
  syl6bb(c1 = ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c1)=(c0 √ó c2), (c0 √ó c2)= ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ =(c0 √ó c2))
  eqeq1d((c0 √ó c1), (c0 √ó c2), emptycls, c1 = ‚àÖ)
  syl6eq((c0 √ó c1), emptycls, (c0 √ó ‚àÖ), c1 = ‚àÖ)
  xpeq2(c1, emptycls, c0)
  xp0(c0)
  eqcom(emptycls, (c0 √ó c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 = ‚àÖ, ((c0 √ó c2)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí c2 = ‚àÖ))
  sylbi(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ((c0 √ó c2)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí c2 = ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c0 = ‚àÖ)
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)
  syl5bi(¬¨ c0 = ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó c2)= ‚àÖ, c2 = ‚àÖ, (c0 = ‚àÖ ‚à® c2 = ‚àÖ))
  xpeq0(c0, c2)
  orel1(c0 = ‚àÖ, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  eqtr3(c1, emptycls, c2)
  xpeq2(c1, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: xpcan2
blocks.content: Cancellation law for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpcan2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, c2)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  syl6bbr(wa(wne(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0)))
  xp11(c1, c0, c2, c0)
  biantru(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0))
  eqid(c0)
  sylanb(wn(wne(c1, emptycls)), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  nne(c1, emptycls)
  impbid1(wa(wceq(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl6an(wa(wceq(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  simpl(wceq(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls))
  sylbid(wa(wceq(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls))
  adantr(wceq(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls)))
  syl6bb(wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cxp(c2, c0)))
  eqeq1d(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0), emptycls, wceq(c1, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cxp(c1, c0), emptycls, cxp(emptycls, c0), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  xpeq1(c1, emptycls, c0)
  0xp(c0)
  eqcom(emptycls, cxp(c2, c0))
  adantl(wceq(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)
  syl5bi(wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls), wo(wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  xpeq0(c2, c0)
  orel2(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  eqtr3(c1, emptycls, c2)
  xpeq1(c1, c2, c0)
}

thm xpcan2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí((c1 √ó c0)=(c2 √ó c0)‚Üî c1 = c2))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ((c1 √ó c0)=(c2 √ó c0)‚Üî c1 = c2), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl6bbr((c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), (c1 √ó c0)=(c2 √ó c0), c1 = c2, (c1 = c2 ‚àß c0 = c0))

  biantru(c1 = c2, c0 = c0)

  nne(c1, emptycls)

  simpl(c1 = ‚àÖ, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  sylbid((c1 = ‚àÖ ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), (c1 √ó c0)=(c2 √ó c0), c2 = ‚àÖ, (c2 √ó c0)= ‚àÖ)
  adantr(c1 = ‚àÖ, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ((c1 √ó c0)=(c2 √ó c0)‚Üî(c2 √ó c0)= ‚àÖ))
  syl6bb(c1 = ‚àÖ, (c1 √ó c0)=(c2 √ó c0), (c2 √ó c0)= ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ =(c2 √ó c0))
  eqeq1d((c1 √ó c0), (c2 √ó c0), emptycls, c1 = ‚àÖ)
  syl6eq((c1 √ó c0), emptycls, (‚àÖ √ó c0), c1 = ‚àÖ)
  xpeq1(c1, emptycls, c0)
  0xp(c0)

blocks.name: cnvcnv3
blocks.content: The set of all ordered pairs in a class is the same as the double converse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvcnv3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtri(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))))
  df-cnv(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(c0))
  opelcnv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  mpbii(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  relcnv(ccnv(c0))
  releq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))

  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))

blocks.name: cnvcnv
blocks.content: The double converse of a class strips out all elements that are not ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 26-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvcnv(class c0) {

  syl6eq(cdm(csn(cop(c0, c1))), emptycls, cdm(csn(emptycls)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  dmeqd(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  sneqd(cop(c0, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))

}

  3bitr4i(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c1, c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))

blocks.name: mptiniseg

blocks.name: dmmpt
blocks.content: The domain of the mapping operation in general. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: dmmptss
blocks.content: The domain of a mapping is a subset of its base class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: dmmptg
blocks.content: The domain of the mapping operation is the stated domain, if the function value is always a set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: coeq0
blocks.content: A composition of two relations is empty iff there is no overlap between the range of the second and the domain of the first. Useful in combination with ~ coundi and ~ coundir to prune meaningless terms in the result. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Oct-2014.)

  adantl(wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cxp(c0, c1)), wne(cuni(cxp(c0, c1)), emptycls))
  sylancl(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cxp(c0, c1)), wne(cuni(cxp(c0, c1)), emptycls), wss(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cuni(cxp(c0, c1))), wne(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))

thm elsnxp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  sylbir(wex(s0, wa(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c2, cop(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c3, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  bitr4i(wrex(s0, c3, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))))
  df-rex(s0, c3, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))

  biimpa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(c2, cop(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cop(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)))
  opeq1d(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c0)

  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c2, cop(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cxp(csn(c0), c3)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cxp(csn(c0), c3)))

blocks.content: There is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff iff there are uniquely two sets fulfilling a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jun-2023.)

blocks.name: opreu2reurex
blocks.content: There is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff iff there are uniquely two sets fulfilling a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jun-2023.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm opreu2reurex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wa(wreu(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wreu(s2, c1, wrex(s1, c0, w1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wa(wreu(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wreu(s2, c1, wrex(s1, c0, w1))), wa(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))), wa(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))))))))
  anbi2i(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))))))))
  2rexbiia(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))))))
  2ralbidva(s1, s2, c0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wb(wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))))
  imbi2i(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))
  bitri(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqcom(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  opth(cv(s1), cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  reu3op(s0, s1, s2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  2reu4(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)

  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs1.w(w1)
}

blocks.name: opreu2reu
blocks.content: If there is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff, then there is a double restricted unique existential qualification fulfilling a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 25-Jun-2023.) (Revised by AV, 2-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm opreu2reu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, w1)), wa(wreu(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wreu(s2, c1, wrex(s1, c0, w1))))
  opreu2reurex(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  2rexreu(s1, s2, c0, c1, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opreu2reu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0)‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = < s1, s2 > ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà(c0 √ó c1), w0), ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, w1)), (‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, w1))‚àß ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, w1))))
  opreu2reurex(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  2rexreu(s1, s2, c0, c1, w1)
}
